KFF reports that CA, OR, NM, NY, and ME all maintain statewide stay-at-home orders.    https://web.archive.org/web/20200624191031/https://www.kff.org/coronavirus-covid-19/issue-brief/state-data-and-policy-actions-to-address-coronavirus/

Harvard Global Health Institute testing and tracing tracker (released July 1) shows most states not meeting their stated testing goals, though fee-for-service options continue to be offered.    https://web.archive.org/web/20200704215224/https://globalepidemics.org/july-6-2020-state-testing-targets/

Harvard Global Health Institute testing and tracing tracker (released July 1) shows most states not meeting their stated contact tracing goals.    https://web.archive.org/web/20200704215224/https://globalepidemics.org/july-6-2020-state-testing-targets/
